sentence: Why did the crab not share any plankton with his friends? because he was shellfish.
explanation: Referring to a type of marine creature as well as someone who is selfish.
first_new_sentence: The shellfish population in the bay has increased significantly this year.
second_new_sentence: Many people consider being shellfish to be a negative trait in relationships.

sentence: What did the police do to the sweater? they pulled it over.
explanation: Referring to the act of pulling a clothing item over oneself as well as the arresting action by police.
first_new_sentence: The strong man pulled the heavy cart up the hill.
second_new_sentence: The police pulled the suspect over for a routine traffic stop.

sentence: What do you call a sad tree? mourning wood.
explanation: Referring to the act of expressing sorrow as well as a type of wood
first_new_sentence: The mourning period for the deceased can last for several weeks.
second_new_sentence: The coffin was made of beautiful mourning wood that had dark, rich grains.
